stfu.options.title: STFU
stfu.options.maxChatHistory.description: The maximum number of messages to keep in chat history.
stfu.options.announceAdvancements.descri: If minecraft shows advancements achieved in chat.
stfu.options.advancementToasts.descripti: If minecraft shows advancements achieved as a toast.
stfu.options.recipeToasts.description: If minecraft shows a toast when you unlock new recipes.
stfu.options.adminChat.description: Whether you receive a message when an admin or command block runs a command.
stfu.options.compactChat.description: When you receive multiple equal chat messages, compact them into one.
stfu.options.disableFade.widget.descript: Disable the 2 seconds all buttons are invisible on the title screen after loading.
stfu.options.disableFade.description: Disable the 2 second fade animation when the game or resources (re)load.
